amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection Of Persons And Property
amendatorysection.para: Except as otherwise provided in this code, this code applies to (1) the affairs and estates of decedents, missing persons, and persons to be protected, domiciled in this state, (2) the property of nonresidents located in this state or property coming into the control of a fiduciary who is subject to the laws of this state, (3) incapacitated persons and minors in this state, except as provided in the Nebraska Uniform Adult Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Jurisdiction Act, and (4) survivorship and related accounts in this state.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Uniform Adult Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Jurisdiction Act, see section 30-3901.
